name: Quillaya saponaria
Relationship: Compare: KALI-HYD.; GELS.; CEPA.; SQUILLA. SAPONARIA (sore throat, involuntary urination). Senega.
details: Produces and cures symptoms of acute catarrh, sneezing and sore throat. MOST EFFECTIVE IN THE BEGINNING OF CORYZA, frequently checking its further development. Colds with sore throat; heat and dryness of throat. Cough with difficult expectoration. Squamous skin.
